description: Warriors forward Draymond Green left Monday's game against the Spurs with a pelvic contusion. Golden State is already without Stephen Curry (ankle), Kevin Durant (ribs) and Klay Thompson (hand).
maintext:
Draymond heads to locker room after taking shot to groin
Draymond Green winces in pain after colliding with Danny Green. His injury is diagnosed as a "midsection contusion."
title: Draymond Green exits Warriors-Spurs with pelvic contusion
